name: Bug Juice (cafeDraw, Fire duck)
description:
Welcome wee pupae to the bug grinder.

Grab your weapon and  shoot your way out the lab that has held you prisoner.

CONTROLS

Move: WASD
Aim: Mouse 
Shoot: LMB

CREDITS

Programmer: Fireduck
Art / Animation: cafeDraw

Music [Licensed via Artlist.io]

"Tremodillos" Francesco D'Andrea

German Beauty Font by: Tom Raaijmakers
